means: 逾越节，逾越节祭神的羔羊

sentence.Network_en: Tomorrow night at sundown, the Jewish holiday of Passover begins.
sentence.Network_cn: 明天晚上太阳下山的时候，犹太人的逾越节便开始了。

sentence.Network_en: Kate had invited Alan to spend the Passover with her.
sentence.Network_cn: 凯特已经邀请了艾伦和她一起过逾越节。

sentence.Network_en: The Jewish feast of Passover began last night.
sentence.Network_cn: 犹太人的宗教节日逾越节昨晚开始了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: and wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?他进那家去、你们就对那家的主人说、夫子说、客房在那里、我与门徒好在那里吃逾越节的筵席。
then Moses called for all the elders of Israel , and said unto them , Draw out and take you a lamb according to your families , and kill the passover .于是，摩西召了以色列的众长老来，对他们说，你们要按着家口取出羊羔，把这逾越节的羊羔宰了。
and they did eat of the old corn of the land on the morrow after the passover , unleavened cakes , and parched corn in the selfsame day .11逾越节的次日，他们就吃了那地的出产；正当那日吃无酵饼和烘的榖。
passou 帕苏, passover 帕索韦尔, passover 传过

list.abs: at the end of a passover meal , they sang a hymn .在逾越节筵席结束时，他们唱起了赞美诗。
yankwongphotos... ... 2010_04_06 to 09 Rural China Service Trip 广东肇庆山区小老师 2010_04_02 Passover Feast 逾越节晚餐.
thus Moses told the children of Israel to keep the passover .4于是摩西告诉以色列人要守逾越节。

thou shalt therefore sacrifice the passover unto the LORD thy God , of the flock and the herd , in the place which the LORD shall choose to place his name there .你要在耶和华选择立为他名的居所的地方，把羊和牛作逾越节的祭牲献给耶和华你的神。

encyclopedia.content: 逾越节（Passover），犹太民族最古老的节日，是为纪念历史上犹太人在摩西的领导下成功地逃离埃及，为感谢上帝的拯救而设立的节日。据《圣经》（《出埃及记》第12章）记载，当年以色列人在逃离埃及前夕，上帝命他们在正月14日晚每家杀掉一只未受过伤的公羊羔，把羊血涂在门框上作为以色列家庭的标记。晚上，上帝越过了以色列家庭而把埃及人家中头生的孩子和牲畜全部杀死。上帝吩咐犹太人：“这一天将是你们的纪念日，要当做上主的

entry.tran: （犹太人的）逾越节（自3月或4月开始，持续七八天）
entry.def: Passover is a Jewish festival that begins in March or April and lasts for seven or eight days. Passover begins with a special meal that reminds Jewish people of how God helped their ancestors escape from Egypt.

example.ex: Tomorrow night at sundown, the Jewish holiday of Passover begins...
example.tran: 明天晚上太阳下山的时候，犹太人的逾越节便开始了。

example.ex: Kate had invited Alan to spend the Passover with her.
example.tran: 凯特已经邀请了艾伦和她一起过逾越节。

means.word_mean: 1. (Judaism) a Jewish festival (traditionally 8 days) celebrating the exodus of the Israelites from Egypt
